channel.title: Idea(s)
channel.description:
Note: This topic will be updated when the development of chosen application has started. This topic is created for your ideas!
I have about 2 hours a day free time (exeption of some days with work ect), private servers aren't really my thing anymore although I want to develop some sort of feature for you guys. I will then realise a tutorial for all members to use.
Basically all you need to do is post your idea here, if majority of the forum members agree with a certain idea I will develop on it as soon as possible and change this topic to the development of idea.
Post away :D

item.title: Idea(s)
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

krackkid:

It’s breaking the rules of the board. There for you are breaking the rules.

krackkid:

I don’t believe there is a proper section for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Idea(s)
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“James-RevolutionX, post:21, topic:378015”][quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=473901.msg3465402#msg3465402 date=1294857387]

Then why put a Development up?

Re-think a way of polling.

I don’t know, I didn’t make it. I assume 'cause he’s going to make it into the actual development thread when he gets his ideas together? I’m not saying this should be here, though I’m just trying to say that if it shouldn’t… Then let someone delete or move it that actually can. No point in saying it when it’s already been said before. Should give the person ideas, instead.
[/quote]

I don’t see your contribution in ideas and this has to be a Development before acctually posting it otherwise it isn’t a Development, therefore it can’t be posted here.[/quote]

[quote=“Kono-chan, post:7, topic:378015”][quote author=Saphire` link=topic=473901.msg3465379#msg3465379 date=1294854363]
I can see your following and trying to cause a flame again. Read the topic once more please?
[/quote]

Like I edited in on my post above. Try a revision in-between 317 and 508. Not many people develop them and actually release them. (Ie. 377, 474, 481, 490, something like that.)[/quote]

Read full topic

item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

I know, I was saying all that stuff earlier. By “Exactly” I mean that there is no real section for this. So, since it’s GOING to be a development, I think there’s no problem in it being here for a few hours until it actually is.

item.title: Idea(s)
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“Kono-chan, post:18, topic:378015”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=473901.msg3465417#msg3465417 date=1294859075]

[quote author=halflive9 link=topic=473901.msg3465415#msg3465415 date=1294858860]

Its just a topic for the members who don’t know much can have what they want, I think this topic is perfectly fine as it is.
[/quote]It’s not its breaking the rules of the board. There for you are breaking the rules.

Ok, i agree with you but then tell him where he should post this. I think you need to give it a try in the server help section.
[/quote]Derp~ He wants ideas for a server, not help on it. I don’t believe there is a proper section for it.

Exactly.[/quote]
As far as i can read he wants idea’s to release it but it can be that he will use it for his own server.

Read full topic
